summary: The 'Ensuring Veterans’ Final Resting Place Act of 2025' amends Title 38 of the United States Code to authorize additional burial benefits for veterans when an urn or plaque is provided. It modifies existing regulations regarding headstones and markers, and states that applies to deaths occuring after January 5, 2021. The bill was introduced by Mr. Banks and Ms. Collins and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
